Text: The 1.36 Gb format is fucken obviously made for burning into 2 CD:s. So why the FUCK is the site FULL OF torrents with movies in ONE 1.36 Gb-file?! FUCK!! But thanks for trying... :-)

@Tigh ,
Yes that is the old scenestandard hanging in there even today, but most people nowdays put almost whatever size on usb-sticks and plug that in their tv anyway. Or cable PC-TV. It is also common with 3x1400mb on a DVD-rom.
